decision_conditions:
1. The development hereby permitted shall be commenced within five years from 27/06/06.

2.  The premises shall not be used for day nursery purposes outside 0730 to 1830 Monday to Fridays, nor at any time on Saturday's, Sunday's or Bank or Public Holidays.

3. No more than 36 children shall be accommodated at the day nursery at any time.

4. Before the development hereby permitted commences details of all walls and/or fences to be erected within or on the perimeters of the site shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The walls/fences as approved shall be erected at the site before the development hereby permitted is commenced and retained thereafter in accordance with the approved details.

5. Before the development hereby permitted commences, details of external illumination to be installed within the site shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The illumination as approved shall be provided at the site before the development hereby permitted is commenced and retained thereafter in accordance with the approved details.

6. Before the development hereby permitted commences, details of the type and position of any play equipment to be constructed within the cartilage of the day nursery shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. No play equipment other than that approved shall be erected onsite thereafter, and that provided shall be retained thereafter in the form shown in the approved details.

7. Before the development hereby permitted commences, a scheme shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority demonstrating the measures to be taken to ensure that the pavilion may be utilised for both children's day nursery and a sports pavilion at all times. The measures as agreed shall be put into place before the uses hereby permitted first take place, and shall be retained thereafter in accordance with the approved details.
description: Change of use to mixed use of sports pavilion and childrens' day nursery.
